item.title: Inside Walmart’s AI security stack: How a startup mentality is hardening enterprise-scale defense
item.description: Walmart CISO Jerry Geisler on securing agentic AI, modernizing identity, and Zero Trust for enterprise-scale cybersecurity resilience.

item.title: MIT report misunderstood: Shadow AI economy booms while headlines cry failure

item.title: How AI ‘digital minds’ startup Delphi stopped drowning in user data and scaled up with Pinecone
item.description: Delphi envisions millions of Digital Minds active across domains and audiences. Pinecone sees its database as the retrieval layer.

item.title: Enterprise Claude gets admin, compliance tools—just not unlimited usage
item.description: Anthropic upgraded its Claude Enterprise and Team subscription to offer seats with access to Claude Code and offer additional admin controls.
